Lines: Its a bold move in current sittuation,
it will work only with our assistance.
Belfast Base doesn't have that much defenses,
so catching enemy off guard isn't such bad idea.
They say its darkest under the lamp post...
To hide so close to enemy base, and escape by
passing through it? Quite bold.
We'll be escorting submarine recovering our troops.
As such, we are in position to perform surprise
attack on base defenses to help with breakthrough.
That's what I was planning.
Klaus, are our amphibious MS ready?
Yes. I got ones that were planned
for deployment in Black Sea.
Woow, how is that possible?
It all depends on steadily built personal
conenctions and negotiation tactics
I sure can relly on you, partner!
Well, I guess I'll have to be careful walking around at night...
Hmph, there's nothing wrong with that, so don't worry.
Hahaha, what kind of magic are you using?
You should become merchant once war ends.
That's right, we have to end this war soon.
Good. Brauer's Team, prepare to sortie!
Roger that!
